title: account  transfer
body: hey riot when can i change regions? its almost the 21st.

replies.body: Looks like [**HollyMonster updated us over here**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/riot-official/xWLAkZKW-account-transfers-going-on-cooldown?quitent=006e) that the transfer services are still having some technical issues and aren't able to be brought back online quite yet.
